name: authmobile form
short_description:
this program will make the following tasks:
1-i can save contacts names and  mobile numbers ,
2-i can add another information to my contact like (age,E-mail,Job,Adress,..etc)
3-i can make afunction to search for acontact by(name or mobile number or Email)
4-i can know the Sim card company according to the first 3Digits in the number .
5-i can change the number from an old number to the new number for each company .
 And here's the Classes:
1-Ihave aparent class called ("contacts") .
with protected variables name,mobile number.
the public contains  the following functions(input funtion and it will be pure virtual,show functtion and also will be apure virtual,and ofcource the constructor function contacts)

2-i have 3 child classes from the contacts class

A-MoreInformation class which accept additional information to the contact like the age,the job type,home address.
